title: Raizes Zen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Brazilian
description: Vegetarian buffet, pay per kilo, with numerous vegan options, including hot and cold dishes. Also serves desserts, juice, herbal tea, and coffee. No onions, garlic, or any of the alium family; instead uses asafoetida and sanchuan. Relaxed atmosphere with natural decor and ambient music. Free Wi-Fi with some plugs to charge laptops. By the register there is a shelving unit with a small selection of health food products for sale, including fruit bars, egg free panatonnes and much more.
